message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $8000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $11000. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but $11000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're still interested in the product, but $9000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $13000. What do you think?
I'm getting a bit frustrated, but I'm still interested in the product. I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can you meet me at that price?
